EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Pivotal Breakfast_Melbourne_Q119.1 Hour Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Arrival Details - Pivotal Breakfast
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Please find below your arrival details for the Pivotal Breakfast - Driving Innovation with Application Transformation.
Date: Tuesday, 2nd April 2019 Time: 8:30am - 10:15am (registration opens from 8am) Location: TEA ROOM, Adjacent Melbourne Supper Club, Level 1/161 Spring St, Melbourne VIC 3000
Featured Speakers:
- Lawrence Crowther, CTO APJ, Pivotal - Charles Dagher, Manager Digital Systems, Toyota Australia - Anthony Clarke, AVP & Country Manager ANZ, Pivotal - Ramy El Essawy, Senior Platform Architect, Pivotal
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at communications-apj@pivotal.io.
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
